Articles.Content:
True, I am currently down

At the

Graveyard doing the monster mash.

The person below me Is George lucas.
False im Chuck Norris the user below me is a blender nerd like me

False, I only use it for aligning 3D shapes for creating 2D art.

The user below me uses Spacely Sprockets

False. I don't know what they are and am afraid to find out.

The user below me has launched a SSTO.

True. Twice. But haven't landed either of them successfully, so I'm not yet a professional KSP player.

User below me is already a professional KSP player by my standards.

Indeed I am. Still can't get normal rockets to fly well, though.

Person below me breaks the laws of physics on a daily basis.

Yes. Winglets fly, speed of light.

User below me is composed of stardust.

Indeed, and I survive on starlight.

Person below me speaks Italian.

Falso.

User below me speaks Tagalog/Filipino.

False.

The user below me is running on a laptop.

FALSE! DESKTOP MASTER RACE!~<3

The user below me is not a dog in a fishbowl

True.

The user below me is an ethereal being.

True.

Person below me has English as their main language.

Half-true.

User below me is a titan.

False. Unless it's true. But it isn't.

Person below me has drawn/written Kerbal things.

SPAAAAAAAAAAAAACE!!!!!

The user bellow me is going to put Jeb on an SRB and launch when .20 comes out

True. I swear I am looking SOOOOO forward to that.

The user below me is hiding the release date for .20

True. I hid the date in the head of SQUAD devs

The user below has never seen the Kraken in action

True, probably because I pretty much always have jeb in my flights

The user bellow me has landed on Eeloo

False, I can only get as far as Jool orbit.

The user below me is a demi-god.

I don't know what's your definition of a demi-god, but if you define it as a half-human half-god, then true.

The user below me is a demigod in KSP that can put even the most ridiculously designed ssto spaceplane you won't even believe can fly into orbit and land it in one piece.

True, as long as Jeb isn't on board

*infini-fuel*

The user below me is suffering withdrawal because he/she isn't playing ksp

True, every second of my life I don't play KSP.

The user below suffers from the same problem

True,

The user below me has landed and returned from eve

Well, I've landed? Doesn't count? Aww.

Person below me liked the Avengers.
